ygData.subject: Getting Enchant Metal Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I walked right in to the Library with my human level 5 enchanter and the invisibility spell.  I was quite paranoid and recast it within the city between zones,
ygData.messageBody:
I walked right in to the Library with my human level 5 enchanter and the
invisibility spell. I was quite paranoid and recast it within the city
between zones, but the hard part of the journey was really only trying to
avoid the undead in the forest. (Got jumped by skeletons and saved by a
nearby darkelf.) I just did it this time, without eq or money, to see if I
could do it. The guard in the Neriak bank made me a little leary of trying
to buy it right on that trip ;P

profane

I like being a pessimist ya know,
It makes it easier to deal with my inevitable failure.
--Ed Burns, The Brothers McMullen
